meta.title: Disappearing Spoon: a science history podcast by Sam Kean
meta.description: A topsy-turvy science-y history podcast by Sam Kean. For science history lovers.
meta.subtitle: Science raconteur Sam Kean writes and hosts the Disappearing Spoon - a topsy-turvy science-y history podcast. Funny, spooky, poignant, and just bizarre tales about science, history, and the rest of the universe.
meta.author: Sam Kean

episodes.title: Exposing Nazi Medical Atrocities
episodes.description: How one Jewish doctor, Leo Alexander, single-handedly exposed the worst Nazi medical atrocities of World War II...
episodes.subtitle: How one Jewish doctor, Leo Alexander, single-handedly exposed the worst Nazi medical atrocities of World War II...
episodes.summary: How one Jewish doctor, Leo Alexander, single-handedly exposed the worst Nazi medical atrocities of World War II...

episodes.title: Glove at First Sight
episodes.description: How a long-forgotten woman pioneered the first personal protective equipment, rubber gloves for surgery
